phrases: You do not have to force yourself to attend anymore.
Well, the joint event is a week away, right?
So I went to check on the meeting, but it was already over.
I was on my way home, too, when I found you.
Oh.
Is this the car you drive?
It does not look like the one you had in summer...
Oh, that was a rental.
This baby's mine.
Hikigaya...
Mind if we make a little stop?
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
Here we are.
Mihama Bridge
I will not lose!
I love Yuu-kun-chan! 4 month anniversary!!
We will be together forever!
Hikigaya!
You look kind of cool like that.
Because I am trying to look cool.
So, how are things going?
It is looking pretty bad.
What is looking bad?
It is hard to say exactly...
Well, try telling me anyway.
Okay...
Then...
I guess time is the problem.
I do not see how we can turn this situation around in a week.
Tamanawa and Isshiki are both scared
to think of this thing failing because of them.
So, to distribute the responsibility, they ask for others' opinions
Christmas Event -Orchestra -Band -Jazz concert -Choir -Dance -Play -Gospel -Musical -Dramatic reading
and try to implement those.
And the result is this plateau we are stuck on.
We were wrong not to decide
who is on top, and who should bear the responsibility.
I guess that is about it.
You have a good eye.
You are very good at reading people's mental states.
I am not...
But...
You do not understand emotions.
One's mental state and the emotions they feel are not always equal.
That is why they sometimes reach conclusions that seem completely illogical.
That is why Yukinoshita, Yuigahama, and you
all give wrong answers, too.
Uh, they have nothing to do with this, do they?
They are the ones I was asking you about in the first place.
But, well...
In essence, they are both the same.
Both problems have the same root.
It is in the heart.
But that is not something you can understand by thinking, is it?
You do not understand?
Then think harder.
If you can only think in terms of calculations, then calculate it.
Lay out all the answers,
and knock them out one by one via process of elimination.
What is left, in the end, is your answer.
Still, it is not something you can really understand, is it?
Then either you calculated wrong, or you missed something.
You just have to calculate it all over again.
You are nuts.
You imbecile.
If emotions could be calculated, they would have been digitized by now.
The answer left behind because you could not calculate it
is what you call human emotion.
Of course, I say that,
but it is probably because I keep miscalculating that I cannot get married...
Just the other day, my friend got married...
No, that is because the guys you know have lousy taste.
Huh?
If I would been born ten years earlier...
If I would met her ten years earlier,
I probably would have fallen madly in love with her.
Not that there is any point in hypothesizing about it.
Wh-Where did that come from?
N-Never mind...
I would not call it thanking you, but I will give you a hint.
When you think, do not pinpoint the wrong thing to think about.
For example...
The reason you are helping Isshiki individually,
and not as part of the Service Club.
Try thinking about that.
For the Service Club's sake,
or in other words, for Yukinoshita's sake.
It is plain to see.
Yukinoshita came to report to me after the election.
She will not talk about herself,
but just watching her, I thought it might be the case.
Does that go for you, too?
Uh... er... I do not know...
If you had the same thing in mind,
you might arrive at the idea of distancing
yourself from them so you would not hurt them.
Hypothetically, of course.
Well, yeah...
Hypothetically, of course.
But that is not what you need to think about.
In this case, what you should think about is why you
do not want to hurt them.
And that answer will come to you immediately.
You do not want to hurt them because they are important to you.
But you know, Hikigaya...
It is impossible not to hurt someone.
Humans unconsciously hurt others simply by existing.
Whether you are alive or dead, you keep hurting people.
Getting involved will hurt them,
but trying not to get involved might hurt them, too.
But if it is someone you do not care about,
you will not notice you have hurt them.
What is important is your awareness of it.
It is because you care about them
that you feel like you have hurt them.
Caring about someone means
being resolved to the fact that you will hurt them.
That is your hint.
The more people care for each other,
the farther out of reach certain things get.
But that is not something to be sad about.
I think it is probably something to be proud of.
Is not that kind of hard to do?
Oh, yeah, it is hard.
But you can do it.
I could, after all.
It is a little arrogant to say someone else can do it just because you could.
You are so unlovable!
Okay...
I will be honest.
It probably does not have to be you, really.
Someday,
Yukinoshita might change on her own.
Someone might show up who can understand her.
Someone might get inside her.
The same can be said for Yuigahama.
Someday?
For you kids, right now feels like everything.
But that is not true at all.
At some point, everything will balance out.
That is how the world is made.
I just...
think it would be nice if it could be you.
I am hoping you and Yuigahama can get inside Yukinoshita.
Still...
I do not really know what to...
Right now is not everything,
but there are things you can only do now,
and things you can only have here.
Now, Hikigaya.
Now is the time.
Think.
Agonize.
Struggle.
Worry.
Otherwise, it is not the real thing.
But...
Just because you suffered does not make it the real thing, does it?
Seriously, you are so unlovable.
The biggest immediate obstacle is, obviously, the joint Christmas event.
The problem with Isshiki Iroha is attached to that.
Employment consultations on the rise
And the situation with Tsurumi Rumi ties into that.
Where is the ideal solution to all three problems?
Diversifying Communication
The uses and shortcomings of modern tools
An Unexpected Crisis...?
The Pitfalls Lurking in Convenience
Proactively start a dialogue now and then
Requesting the Cooperation of Students
Dangers
I cannot turn that situation around alone.
Cooperation
Should I ask someone for help?
Why do I immediately try to depend on someone else?
Dialogue
Connections between people are a narcotic.
Communication
Before you know it, you get hooked...
When I was dealing with the election, Komachi gave me my reason.
It is for Komachi.
I used that as a front to take action.
No, if I had not done that, I...
I was probably wrong then.
And now, too.
The answer I found for myself...
I have to act for my own reasons.
Why did not I want to let Yukinoshita or Yuigahama become president?
My true reason for acting, after getting a reason from someone else...
Because there was something I wanted.
High
Come in.
Hikki...
What is up?
Why did you knock?
I told you that you did not have to force yourself to attend anymore.
I had business here.
W-Want to sit down?
Is something wrong?
You are not acting like usual...
I want to make a request.
Hikki...
You are going to talk to us?
It is about the Christmas event Isshiki brought up.
It is going a lot worse than I expected.
I would like you to help.
But...
No, I know what you want to say.
I took this on myself.
And I said our helping would not help Isshiki.
But I am the one who pushed Isshiki to become president.
Do you remember the kids from Chiba Village?
The girl from there is helping, but she is the same as back then.
Oh...
Rumi-chan, was it?
That is why I want to do something.
My own actions are the underlying because.
I know I am being selfish.
But still, I want to ask for your help.
It is your fault.
That is what you are saying, correct?
Yeah.
I cannot deny that.
I see.
If you caused these problems yourself,
then I think you should solve them yourself.
You are right.
Sorry.
Forget I asked.
Wait!
That is not true!
Why does it have to be like that?
It is not right!
No, it is right.
I should take care of my own problems.
That is how it works.
That is right.
No, it is not!
What you are both saying is not right at all!
Look, it is not just your fault, Hikki.
Maybe you are the one who came up with that stuff, and carried it all out...
But we were wrong, too!
We forced it all onto you!
No, that is not true.
It is true!
It is not just your fault things ended up this way!
It is my fault, too...
I think what you said was a little unfair, Yukinon.
You are saying this now?
You are unfair, as well.
Hang on.
This is not what I wanted to talk about.
Yukinon, you did not tell us anything.
There are things we cannot know if you do not tell us.
You did not say anything, either.
You only made conversation to keep up appearances.
So if that is what you...
If that is what both of you wanted, you...
But there are things you cannot understand even if you are told, are not there?
That is...
Even if you would told me, I probably would not have accepted it.
I would have thought there was something behind it,
some circumstances making you talk that way,
even if it was my own selfish idea.
But if we would talked about it...
If I had talked to you more... I...
I do not mean that.
Saying you would understand because you were told is arrogant.
It is an ego trip for the person who said it,
or the conceit of the person who was told.
After things happen, there is no guarantee everyone will
understand if they talk about it.
So what I want is not words.
But if you do not say anything, we will never have any way to understand.
You are right.
Thinking you will understand without being told anything is an illusion.
But...
But...
What I want is not words.
What I wanted was definitely there.
And it was not mutual understanding,
or to be friends, or to be together,
or anything like that.
I do not want to be understood.
I want to understand.
I want to understand.
I want to know.
I want to feel at ease knowing.
I want peace of mind.
Because not understanding terrifies me.
Saying I want to understand everything is extremely self-righteous.
It is a dictatorial and conceited wish.
It is shameless and repulsive.
And I am absolutely disgusted at myself for wanting that.
But if...
If we feel the same way...
If a relationship exists where we can force
that ugly self-consciousness upon each other, and accept it...
I know there is no way that can happen.
I realize that is completely out of reach.
But still...
But still, I...
I want
the real thing!
Hikki...
I do not understand.
I am sorry.
Yukinon!
Hikki!
We have to go!
Uh, but...
We have to go together!
Yukinon said she does not understand!
I think she just does not know what to do!
I have no idea, either, but...
But we cannot let it end without ever knowing!
This is our only chance!
I have never seen Yukinon act like that!
So we have to go now!
It is okay.
I can walk myself.
Let us go.
Yeah!
Ah... um... I wanted to talk to you...
Sorry, Iroha-chan.
Later, okay?
Senpai, there is no meeting today.
I came to tell you that... a-and...
Okay, got it.
Listen!
I am not done talking.
If you are looking for Yukinoshita-senpai, she is on the roof.
Sorry.
Thanks.
Yukinon!
I do not understand.
What do you mean by the real thing?
It is...
Yukinon, it is okay.
What is okay?
I did not really understand, either.
So I think,
if we talk, we will understand more.
But we probably will not really understand even then, huh?
And then we would probably never understand...
But, like, we would understand that... or something...
Nope, I guess I really do not get it.
But...
I do not like the way things are now.
Why are you the one crying?
You really are...
unfair.
Hikigaya-kun.
Yeah?
I accept your request.
Thanks.
I will help, too.
But Still, Hikigaya Hachiman Is...
I appreciate it.
09 And, Yukinoshita Yukino Is...
This beer is so good!
Man, I said some uncharacteristically awesome stuff there.
Go, me!
I am such a great teacher!
No... a great woman?
I am a great woman, so why cannot I get married?
Excuse me!
The sampler, please!
And a husband, while we are at it!
Just kidding...
Damn, Christmas already?
Makes me sick...
If only I did not have to work!
If I did not have to work, I could go out for Christmas!
Excuse me!
Highball, please!
I want to get married...
